subcategories.title: Authentication
subcategories.definition: Controls for authenticating admins and services to hypervisor and management planes.

subcategories.title: Authorization
subcategories.definition: Runtime access decisions and permission enforcement across clusters, hosts, and inventory objects.

subcategories.title: Federation
subcategories.definition: Directory integration, SSO, and identity federation for admin access.

subcategories.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
subcategories.definition: Enforce MFA/2FA for console, CLI, and API access to management endpoints.

subcategories.title: Session Management
subcategories.definition: Token/session lifetime, idle timeouts, device trust, and break-glass controls.

subcategories.title: Least Privilege (Identity)
subcategories.definition: Constrain user/service permissions and apply just-in-time elevation for tasks.

subcategories.title: Role Definition
subcategories.definition: Define roles, permissions, and scopes for clusters, resource pools, and datastores.

subcategories.title: Role Assignment
subcategories.definition: Bind roles to users, groups, and service principals with clear scopes and expiry.

subcategories.title: Least Privilege
subcategories.definition: Review and minimize effective permissions on inventory objects and APIs.

subcategories.title: Segregation of Duties (SoD)
subcategories.definition: Prevent toxic combinations (e.g., snapshot+export, network+security policy).

subcategories.title: Privileged Operations Control

subcategories.title: Secret Storage
